DOC.brief_summary: Detection of metabolic state of women with polycystic ovary using NA-Nose.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of PCOS by Sensors Array
DOC.detailed_description: Breath of women undergoing fertility treatment including PCOS and ovulatory women will be collected and transferred for our labs for further analysis in define the metabolic state. The detection will be made using sensors arrays and GCMS.
DOC.criteria: women undergoing follow up for ovulation detection. Pregnancy
